attributes.action: Stop the proposed march by the Islam4UK group through Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposed "march" is an absolute disgrace and an insult to our armed forces.  It's about time our politicians put a halt to this insidious scheme.  If the people that belong to this group wish to live amongst us and enjoy the freedom that we all have it is about time they showed some respect to those who put their lives on the line for us all.  The people involved in this group are nothing short of a disgrace to humanity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
